property.name: website_1
property.value: insert into website_date_user_count values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE newval = ?, todayval = ?,totalval = ?

property.name: website_2
property.value: insert into website_date_member_count values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE newval = ?, todayval = ?,totalval = ?

property.name: website_3
property.value: insert into website_date_browser_user_count values(?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE newval = ?, todayval = ?,totalval = ?

property.name: website_session
property.value: insert into website_date_session_count values(?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ssnumber = ?, ssduration = ?,avgssduration = ?
